name: Hello Crazy Neighbor
description:
Get a hold of what your crazy old neighbor next door is up to. Rumor has it that he has killed his wife and has ran out to move here. That is so scary! You could be next for that psychopath to shoot. Take the matters in your hand and investigate the matter for surety, before informing the police.

Who’s your neighbor killing next? And what did he do previously? Hi neighbor! Team smarty pants is on the murder case in the scary house. Meany is one angry neighbor, do not be seen, sneak in and hide out. It is gonna be so dangerous to confront the scary guy of the neighbor house. Your neighbor is no less than neighbors from hell. Play this fast pace game and turn the vicious boogie man to the cops.

DOWNLOAD now and have fun!
